annotations:
Good Day,
Exclusive on our hands, the vessel below is For Sale;
M/V EY PEARL (Ex Lady Nur)

IMO 8922278
Flag Saint Kitts & Nevis
DWT 3262
Built Year / Place 1991 / Bijlsma Scheepswerf BV
Class Overseas Marine Certification (Omcs)(Non Iacs)
Ice Class 1A
Ss/Dd 2029-04 2027-04
Grt/Nrt 1999 / 1203
Ho/Ha 1/2
Grain / Bale 4519 CBM /
LOA 82.0 M
Beam 12.5 M
Draft 4.95 M
Main Engine 1 × Caterpillar 3606TA 2,203 BHP @ 930 RPM
Speed Consumption 9 Knots on 2.8mt, idle 0.3mt
TEU 128
Co2 Not Fitted
Dangerous Cargo Fitted for IMSBC
Gearless
Ldt 1008
Bwts will be fitted in September.
Holding full details. Can guide on the price.
(All dtls wog)
Best regards
Miss. Aysel ÜNAL
